Gather comments from customers, team members, and stakeholders in one place and transform it into actionable tasks that you work through in Figma.


What often takes days or weeks, Loops helps you do in minutes.


HOW LOOPS WORKS


Group Mode

  1. Export designs to Loops and share the link.
  2. People get instant access with no login needed.
  3. See who's live and respond in realtime.
  4. Tag, filter, bookmark, then see an interactive task list back in Figma and action the feedback.


Experiment Mode

  1. Build your test. Export designs to Loops and select the regions for feedback.
  2. Choose your audience. Use your people or recruit from our global panel.
  3. Users give feedback. Get quant and qual results in realtime & build a task list.
  4. Update your design. See your interactive task list in Figma and action the feedback.


WHY LOOPS


Remove the admin of feedback. No sign ups or logins. Access 110m people from consumers to experts instantly.


Keep feedback focused. Your respondents are guided step-by-step through your design.


Connect insight to ideas. See feedback annotated on your designs.


Visit useloops.com
